text: “Ndipo Iye ndi Yemwe adatambasula nthaka ndikuika mapiri ndi mitsinje m’menemo. Ndipo mtundu uliwonse wazipatso adaupanga m’menemo kukhala mitundu iwiri iwiri, (yachimuna ndi yachikazi), amavindikira usiku ndi usana. Ndithu m’zimenezi muli zisonyezo (zazikulu zosonyeza kuti Allah alipo) kwa anthu olingalira
